# 名人堂 II

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mingrentang-ii
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mingrentang-ii
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mingrentang-ii
mingrentang-ii <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mingrentang-ii
mingrentang-ii <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
